company.description: itemis has been an independent IT consulting firm since 2003 and is already one of the market leaders in the field of IT-industrialization and model-driven software development. We are also successful in Eclipse Modeling, embedded systems and the development of applications for mobile devices. Research and training are our additional specialties.

office.summary: Our office in the former federal capital Bonn is located close to the river Rhine and the Bonn-University.
office.address: itemis AG Standort Bonn Bonner Talweg 42 53113 Bonn

office.summary: Our Dortmund office is located directly on the central arterial road, Bundesstraße 1, near Westfalendamm.
office.address: itemis AG Standort Dortmund Westfalendamm 251 44141 Dortmund
itemis AG Standort Frankfurt Lyoner Straße 40 60528 Frankfurt am Main

office.summary: The Hamburg branch is located directly on Ring 2, north-east of the Alster. The office is located in the Hamburg Business Centre. Also situated in the same building is the Economic Center of Hamburg, which includes amongst others, all of the business support institutions in Hamburg and Hamburg@work.
office.address: itemis AG Standort Hamburg Dorotheenstr. 48 22301 Hamburg

office.summary: Our Kiel office specializes in model-driven software development and Eclipse-based tool chains for enterprise applications and embedded systems.
office.address: itemis AG Standort Kiel Am Germaniahafen 1 24143 Kiel

office.summary: Our Leipzig office serves the central German region. It is located on Listbogen near the main train station.
office.address: itemis AG Standort Leipzig Ludwig-Erhard-Straße 51 04103 Leipzig

office.summary: Our main office is located in Lünen an der Lippe, directly north of Dortmund. We have been in the Lünen Technology Center on the premises of the former mine of Achenbach since 2003.

office.address: itemis GmbH Standort Stuttgart Meitnerstraße 10 70563 Stuttgart
itemis France SARL Rond point Benjamin Franklin CS 39521 34960 Montpellier Cedex 2 France
office.geo: Rond point Benjamin Franklin CS 39521, 34960 Montpellier Cedex 2

office.address: itemis Schweiz GmbH TECHNOPARK® Aargau Dorfstrasse 69 5210 Windisch Switzerland
